topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5499c996636872258d7d0000#post_5499c996636872258d7d0000
Stand name: Deck the Halls.

Ability: Materialization.
Deck the Halls takes the form of a large red bag. When the user reaches into the bag he can pull out anything. The catch is that Deck the Halls can only materialize objects another person is thinking of.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
